summary: A PIECE OF WINDOW MOLDING  DISINTEGRATED .  AND ALLOWED WATER TO PERMEATE THE INSULATION IN THE DASH AS WELL AS THE REST OF THE CAR. THIS WAS NOT APPARENT UNTIL AN ODOR WAS DETECTED. NEITHER FORD OR THE DEALER WILL OFFER ANY COMPENSATION. THE COST FOR REPAIRS IS $4,500 AND WAS TOLD BOOK VALUE IS $,9,000
